metadata.title: Tuesday, 20th September, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) what the progress, in percentage terms, on the rehabilitation of the Petauke - Chief Sandwe - Chilongozi - Mfuwe road in Eastern Province was, as of February, 2022;
(b) how much money was spent on the project, as of February, 2022;
(c) what the cost of the outstanding works is; and
(d) when the project will be completed.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct communication towers in Chieftainess Mwape’s chiefdom in Nyimba District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the Kalomo-Mapatizya road, which is in a deplorable condition;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) when the road will be tarred. 27 Ms Nakaponda (Isoka) - to ask the Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts:
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct the following infrastructure in Isoka District:
(i) a football stadium; (ii) a basket ball court; and (iii) a volleyball court;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a modern hospital in Siavonga District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there no such plans, why. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Thanks – His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (13th September) - Resumption of Debate. ____________________________
